abstracted_objective: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn
Analyze an input to identify, isolate, and characterize its essential components, attributes, and relationships that define its structure and function.
Define, apply, or analyze a systematic transformation or mapping that converts input entity(ies) into corresponding output representation(s) or state(s).
Generate a sequence of outputs or states by iteratively applying defined operations to an initial input or preceding result in a specified order.
Evaluate a collection of elements against defined criteria or conditions and identify, select, or rank those that satisfy the specified requirements.
End of current sequential code flow
